data.title: Media: Pot Growers in Sacramento Will Need a Lot of Electricity. SMUD Wants to Help
data.excerpt: It takes a lot of juice to grow pot indoors, so Sacramento’s major electric utility is gearing up for the heavy demands of recreational marijuana growers come January.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
